scripts.say: Graf Spee has sunk many ships, but she always lets their crews get to safety first... Seeing as she plays nice, I'll let you off the hook now.
Guh... You're a twisted sadist... but... at least you're not all bad...
I think she has lost consciousness. Is it really okay to leave her like this?
As much as I love having more toys to play with... we can't fight Graf Spee with the burden of a captive on our backs.
Or does the "honour of the Crown" dictate that you tow her all the way home?
People like you are just... Ugh, fine! We're moving on.
